MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW1 postcode area of Crewe, affecting properties in Peter Place and surrounding streets. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repairs required to an underground cable fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6.34PM on 19th March 2021.
